definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 結論外來人口是深圳市結核病疫情的主要組成部分。

sentences.english: Third, make non-native population participate in all-people body-building activities.
sentences.chinese: 三是針對外來人口全民健身活動。

sentences.english: But he said that Americans are a simple people - a frequent comment among folks in China about foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 但他表示，美國人是一個經常評論中國的外來人。

sentences.english: Objective To study the characteristics of psychiatric expert testimony cases of temporary and permanent residents.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究廣州本地及外來人口精神司法鑑定案例特點。

sentences.english: In Shenzhen, the population from outside is so large; sometimes I feel scared.
sentences.chinese: 在深圳，外來人口太多，有時候我會覺得害怕。

sentences.english: Platform for private only. Parents please be seated in the spectator area.
sentences.chinese: 主席臺禁止外來人員進入，請家長在兩側觀衆席就坐。

sentences.english: No wonder that the migrants are increasingly restive.
sentences.chinese: 因此外來人員日益感到不安也就不足爲奇了。

sentences.english: Budget pressures have made them highly reluctant to spend money on helping the incomers.
sentences.chinese: 預算壓力使他們很難傾囊扶助外來人口。

sentences.english: The stranger took up the bundle which he had brought and untied it.
sentences.chinese: 這外來人拿起他帶來的那個包袱，解開了結子。

sentences.english: Next year, the smoking ban will be expanded to include visitors.
sentences.chinese: 明年禁止吸菸的規定還將擴展至進入院區的外來人員。

sentences.english: Some 90 per cent of the 1.77 million population are expats.
sentences.chinese: 迪拜總人口有177萬，但90%爲外來人口。

sentences.english: Bush emphasized the need for immigrants to enter the United States legally.
sentences.chinese: 布什總統強調外來人員必須合法入境美國。
